A

AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter<T> - Class in org.microbean.jersey.netty
A partial ContainerResponseWriter implementation that is aware of Netty constructs.
AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter(T, ChannelHandlerContext, Supplier<? extends ScheduledExecutorService>) - Constructor for class org.microbean.jersey.netty.AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter
Creates a new AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter implementation.
acceptInboundMessage(Object) - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.JerseyChannelInboundHandler
Returns true if and only if the supplied message is an instance of HttpRequest, HttpContent, Http2HeadersFrame or Http2DataFrame.
addByteBuf(ByteBuf) - Method in interface org.microbean.jersey.netty.ByteBufQueue
Adds the supplied ByteBuf to this ByteBufQueue implementation.
addByteBuf(ByteBuf) - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream
Adds the supplied ByteBuf to the CompositeByteBuf maintained by this EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream.

Creates a new ByteBufChunkedInput.
ByteBufQueue - Interface in org.microbean.jersey.netty
An interface indicating that implementations can add a ByteBuf to themselves.

A ByteBufQueue and an InputStream that reads from a (possibly mutating and expanding) CompositeByteBuf, ensuring that all operations occur only on the Netty event loop thread.

L

length() - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.FunctionalByteBufChunkedInput
Returns the length of this ChunkedInput implementation in bytes, or -1L if a representation of its length is not available.

N

needsOutputStream(long) - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter
Returns true if the current ContainerResponse being written needs an OutputStream.
needsOutputStream(long) - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.Http2ContainerResponseWriter
Implements the AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter.needsOutputStream(long) method by returning true if and only if the supplied contentLength is not equal to 0L and if the request method converted to uppercase is not equal to the return value of invoking HttpMethod.HEAD.name().
needsOutputStream(long) - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.HttpContainerResponseWriter
Implements the AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter.needsOutputStream(long) method by returning true if and only if the supplied contentLength is not equal to 0L and if the request method is not HEAD.

O

org.microbean.jersey.netty - package org.microbean.jersey.netty
Provides classes and interfaces for integrating Jersey into Netty.

read(Function<? super ByteBuf, ? extends Integer>) - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream
Applies the supplied Function to a ByteBuf, ensuring that the Function application takes place on the Netty event loop thread, and returns the result of invoking Integer.intValue() on the Function's return value.

Deprecated.
Please use the FunctionalByteBufChunkedInput.readChunk(ByteBufAllocator) method instead.
readChunk(ByteBufAllocator) - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.FunctionalByteBufChunkedInput
Returns a chunk of this FunctionalByteBufChunkedInput's overall input as represented by the ByteBuf and using the Function supplied to it at construction time.

writeFailureMessage() - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter
Called to write a message indicating a general unspecified server failure.
writeFailureMessage() - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.Http2ContainerResponseWriter
Writes a new DefaultHttp2Headers message with a status equal to 500.
writeFailureMessage() - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.HttpContainerResponseWriter
Writes a new DefaultFullHttpResponse message with a Content-Length of 0 and a status equal to HttpResponseStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.
writeLastContentMessage() - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter
Called to allow this AbstractNettyContainerResponseWriter implementation to write a message that indicates that there is not going to be any further content sent back to the client.
writeLastContentMessage() - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.Http2ContainerResponseWriter
Writes and flushes new DefaultHttp2DataFrame(true) when invoked.
writeLastContentMessage() - Method in class org.microbean.jersey.netty.HttpContainerResponseWriter
Writes and flushes LastHttpContent.EMPTY_LAST_CONTENT when invoked.
